00023 void InitializeRandom()
00024 {
00025   // Seed the random-number generator with current time so that
00026   // the numbers will be different every time we run.
00027   srand( (unsigned) time(NULL) );
00028       #ifdef PRERANDOM_GENERATOR
00029             //Pregenerate all of the random numbers.
00030             for( guiPreRandomIndex = 0; guiPreRandomIndex < MAX_PREGENERATED_NUMS; guiPreRandomIndex++ )
00031             {
00032                   guiPreRandomNums[ guiPreRandomIndex ] = rand();
00033             }
00034             guiPreRandomIndex = 0;
00035       #endif
00036 }
00037 
00038 // Returns a pseudo-random integer between 0 and uiRange
00039 UINT32 Random(UINT32 uiRange)
00040 {
00041       // Always return 0, if no range given (it's not an error)
00042       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00043             if( gfCountRandoms )
00044             {
00045                   guiRandoms++;
00046             }
00047       #endif
00048 
00049   if (uiRange == 0)     
00050             return(0);
00051       return rand() * uiRange / RAND_MAX % uiRange;
00052 }
00053 
00054 BOOLEAN Chance( UINT32 uiChance )
00055 {
00056       return (BOOLEAN)(Random( 100 ) < uiChance);
00057 }
00058 
00059 #ifdef PRERANDOM_GENERATOR
00060 
00061 UINT32 PreRandom( UINT32 uiRange )
00062 {
00063       UINT32 uiNum;
00064       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00065             if( gfCountRandoms )
00066             {
00067                   guiPreRandoms++;
00068             }
00069       #endif
00070       if( !uiRange )
00071             return 0;
00072       //Extract the current pregenerated number
00073       uiNum = guiPreRandomNums[ guiPreRandomIndex ] * uiRange / RAND_MAX % uiRange;
00074       //Replace the current pregenerated number with a new one.
00075 
00076       //This was removed in the name of optimization.  Uncomment if you hate recycling.
00077       //guiPreRandomNums[ guiPreRandomIndex ] = rand();
00078 
00079       //Go to the next index.
00080       guiPreRandomIndex++;
00081       if( guiPreRandomIndex >= (UINT32)MAX_PREGENERATED_NUMS )
00082             guiPreRandomIndex = 0;
00083       return uiNum;
00084 }
00085 
00086 BOOLEAN PreChance( UINT32 uiChance )
00087 {
00088       return (BOOLEAN)(PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChance);
00089 }
00090 
00091 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00092 void CountRandomCalls( BOOLEAN fStart )
00093 {
00094       gfCountRandoms = fStart;
00095       if( fStart )
00096       {
00097             guiRandoms = 0;
00098             guiPreRandoms = 0;
00099       }
00100 }
00101 
00102 void GetRandomCalls( UINT32 *puiRandoms, UINT32 *puiPreRandoms )
00103 {
00104       *puiRandoms = guiRandoms;
00105       *puiPreRandoms = guiPreRandoms;
00106 }
00107 #endif
